wikipedia_page.main: Captain Alexander Victor Drummond (20 October 1888 – 29 April 1937) was an English cricketer.  Drummond's batting and bowling styles are unknown.

response: *Alexander Drummond (1888–1937), English first-class cricketerWisden Cricketer's Almanack 1938, "Obituaries in 1937"
He is the elder brother of Alexander Drummond and father of Diana Kathleen Drummond and George Albert Harley de Vere Drummond.
